text: This page shows the results for Group B of the UEFA Euro 2012 qualification. Russia qualified, and the Republic of Ireland went to the playoffs. Team Pld W D L Pts Russia 10 7 2 1 23 Republic of Ireland 10 6 3 1 21 Armenia 10 5 2 3 17 Slovakia 10 4 3 3 15 Macedonia 10 2 2 6 8 Andorra 10 0 0 10 0 * Green means that the team automatically qualifies. * Blue means the team is going to the playoffs. The top scorer of the group was Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Armenia) with 6 goals. Category:UEFA Euro 2012 qualifying
title: UEFA Euro 2012 qualifying Group B
